Uses of Interface
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.LifeCycle

Packages that use LifeCycle
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app Contains all the Activity basis classes, an Android Application class, and some classes useful to activities. 
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.support.v4.app   
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.ui Some User Interface (UI) widgets. 
 

Uses of LifeCycle in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app
 

Subinterfaces of LifeCycle in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app
 interface Smartable<AggregateClass>
          All activities and fragments of the framework implement this composite interface.
 

Classes in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app that implement LifeCycle
 class AbstractSmartListActivity<AggregateClass,BusinessObjectClass,ListViewClass extends ViewGroup,ViewClass extends View>
          In order to propose a list activity which automates many things regarding its underlying business objects.
 class AbstractWrappedSmartListActivity<AggregateClass,ListViewClass extends ViewGroup>
          Uses wrapped business objects for simplifying the handling of heterogeneous business objects.
 class Droid4mizer<AggregateClass,ComponentClass>
          The class that should be used when extending a legacy class to support the whole droid4me framework features.
 class ForBusinessObjectActivity<AggregateClass,BusinessObjectClass>
          An activity which handles the persistence properly, which proposes a framework regarding the custom action, and which provides a framework regarding the activity life cycle.
 class SmartActivity<AggregateClass>
          The basis class for all activities available in the framework.
 class SmartDialogFragment<AggregateClass>
          A basis classes for designing a DialogFragment compatible with the framework, i.e. droid4me-ready.
 class SmartFragment<AggregrateClass>
          A basis classes for designing a Fragment compatible with the framework, i.e. droid4me-ready.
 class SmartGroupActivity<AggregateClass>
          A basis class for an activity that contains other activities.
 class SmartListActivity<AggregateClass,BusinessObjectClass,ViewClass extends View>
          An instantiation of the AbstractSmartListActivity bound to the native ListView.
 class SmartMapActivity<AggregateClass>
          A basis class for an activity that holds a map.
 class SmartPreferenceActivity<AggregateClass>
          Makes the Android PreferenceActivity compatible with the framework.
 class SmartSplashScreenActivity<AggregateClass,BusinessObjectClass>
          A basis activity class which is displayed while the application is loading.
 class SmartTabActivity<AggregateClass>
          A basis class for an activity that holds some tabs.
 class WrappedSmartListActivity<AggregateClass>
          An instantiation of the AbstractWrappedSmartListActivity bound to the native ListView.

Classes in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.ui that implement LifeCycle

          A simple (not expandable) smart list view.
